AT.name: Final Fight 3™
AT.description: Die Mad Gear Gang wurde zwar besiegt, aber eine neue Bande namens Skull Cross hat ihren Platz eingenommen und ruft eine erneute Welle des Verbrechens in Metro City hervor. Bürgermeister Mike Haggar und Guy bereiten sich darauf vor, den Schurken gemeinsam mit Codys alter Freundin Lucia entgegenzutreten. Mit dabei ist außerdem der rätselhafte Dean, der auf Skull Cross nicht gut zu sprechen ist. Zusammen geloben sie, der Bande das Handwerk zu legen. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Final Fight 3™
AU.description: The Mad Gear gang has been defeated, but a new group known as Skull Cross has risen from the ashes, sparking a fresh crime wave in Metro City. Mayor Mike Haggar and Guy prepare to take them on with Cody's old friend, Lucia. Joining them is Dean, a mystery man with a grudge. Together they vow to bring Skull Cross down! This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Final Fight 3™
BE.description: Le gang Mad Gear a été démantelé, mais un nouveau groupe de criminels, Skull Cross, a émergé et sème à présent le chaos dans les rues de Metro City. Le maire, Mike Haggar, accompagné de Guy et de Lucia, une vieille amie de Cody, s'apprêtent à les affronter. Dean, un homme mystérieux et assoiffé de vengeance, se joint également à eux. Ensemble, ils jurent de venir à bout de Skull Cross ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CH.name: Final Fight 3™
CH.description: Die Mad Gear Gang wurde zwar besiegt, aber eine neue Bande namens Skull Cross hat ihren Platz eingenommen und ruft eine erneute Welle des Verbrechens in Metro City hervor. Bürgermeister Mike Haggar und Guy bereiten sich darauf vor, den Schurken gemeinsam mit Codys alter Freundin Lucia entgegenzutreten. Mit dabei ist außerdem der rätselhafte Dean, der auf Skull Cross nicht gut zu sprechen ist. Zusammen geloben sie, der Bande das Handwerk zu legen. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

BR.name: Final Fight 3™
BR.description: Após a derrota e o desaparecimento da gangue Mad Gear, um pequeno grupo conhecido apenas como “Skull Cross” é responsável por uma nova onda de vandalismo, terrorismo e morte. O governo da cidade de Metro City perdeu as esperanças. O prefeito de Metro City, Mike Haggar, e Guy estão preparados para encarar a nova gangue, mas, antes deles prosseguirem, a porta se abre revelando Lucia, uma velha amiga de Cody. Ela conta que Metro City está sendo atacada, que a gangue Skull Cross está à solta e que eles têm alguma carta na manga. Antes que alguém possa agir, um homem misterioso chamado Dean aparece anunciando que ele sabe tudo sobre a gangue Skull Cross e que está disposto a ajudar. Todos os lutadores se comprometem a acabar com a gangue Skull Cross. Entre com tudo nesta briga que pode até ser a sua luta final!

BG.name: Final Fight 3™
BG.description: The Mad Gear gang has been defeated, but a new group known as Skull Cross has risen from the ashes, sparking a fresh crime wave in Metro City. Mayor Mike Haggar and Guy prepare to take them on with Cody's old friend, Lucia. Joining them is Dean, a mystery man with a grudge. Together they vow to bring Skull Cross down! This is the US version of the game.

CA.name: Final Fight 3™
CA.description: Following the defeat and subsequent disappearance of the Mad Gear Gang, a small group known only as “Skull Cross” is responsible for a new uprising of vandalism, terrorism and death. The government of Metro City is at a complete loss. Metro City’s mayor, Mike Haggar, and Guy are prepared to take on the new gang, but before they can act, the door bursts open, revealing Lucia, Cody’s old friend. “Metro City is under attack!” she shouts, “Skull Cross is loose, and they’ve got something up their sleeves.” But before any of them can move, a mysterious man appears in the doorway. “My name is Dean,” he says. “I know Skull Cross inside-and-out, and I hate them more than anything. I can help you, and you can help me. We must go!” All four fighters vow to bring Skull Cross down. It will be a tough assignment, and may even be their final fight!

FR.name: Final Fight 3™
FR.description: Le gang Mad Gear a été démantelé, mais un nouveau groupe de criminels, Skull Cross, a émergé et sème à présent le chaos dans les rues de Metro City. Ensemble, ils jurent de venir à bout de Skull Cross ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

MT.name: Final Fight 3™
MT.description: The Mad Gear gang has been defeated, but a new group known as Skull Cross has risen from the ashes, sparking a fresh crime wave in Metro City. Mayor Mike Haggar and Guy prepare to take them on with Cody's old friend, Lucia. Joining them is Dean, a mystery man with a grudge. Together they vow to bring Skull Cross down! This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Final Fight 3™
NL.description: De Mad Gear Gang mag dan verslagen zijn, uit de as rijst Skull Cross op, een nieuwe bende die opnieuw voor een vloedgolf van geweld en criminaliteit in Metro City zorgt. Burgemeester Mike Haggar, Guy, Lucia en de mysterieuze Dean slaan de handen ineen. Samen en sterker dan ooit hebben ze een doel voor ogen: het ontbinden van Skull Cross! Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

LU.name: Final Fight 3™
LU.description: Le gang Mad Gear a été démantelé, mais un nouveau groupe de criminels, Skull Cross, a émergé et sème à présent le chaos dans les rues de Metro City. Le maire, Mike Haggar, accompagné de Guy et de Lucia, une vieille amie de Cody, s'apprêtent à les affronter. Dean, un homme mystérieux et assoiffé de vengeance, se joint également à eux. Ensemble, ils jurent de venir à bout de Skull Cross ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

MX.name: Final Fight 3™
MX.description: Tras la derrota y desaparición de la banda Mad Gear, la cuidad de Metro City se ha sumido de nuevo en el caos: un pequeño grupo conocido como Skull Cross ha desatado una ola de vandalismo, terrorismo y muerte. El gobierno de Metro City no tiene esperanzas. A pesar de todo, el alcalde Mike Haggar y su compañero Guy están preparados para enfrentarse a esta nueva banda, pero antes de que puedan hacer nada, la puerta se abre y Lucia, una vieja amiga de Cody, grita "¡Tenemos que hacer algo! Skull Cross está atacando la ciudad y si no hacemos algo, la dejarán en ruinas". Pero antes de que puedan moverse, un hombre misterioso aparece en la puerta. "Yo puedo ayudarles", dice. "Mi nombre es Dean, y conozco a Skull Cross como la palma de mi mano. Y los odio más que a nada. Podemos ayudarnos mutuamente. Pongámonos en marcha". Y con esto los cuatro luchadores juran acabar con Skull Cross. No será nada fácil, y puede que sea la última batalla que peleen.

IT.name: Final Fight 3™
IT.description: La banda della Mad Gear è stata sconfitta, ma un nuovo gruppo chiamato Skull Cross è sorto dalle sue ceneri, portando con sé una fresca ondata di criminalità a Metro City. Il sindaco Mike Haggar e Guy decidono di affrontare la banda criminale con l'aiuto di Lucia, una vecchia amica di Cody e Dean, un uomo misterioso pieno di rancore. Questi quattro eroi sono mossi da un unico scopo: eliminare la Skull Cross! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

RU.name: Final Fight 3™
RU.description: С бандой Mad Gear Gang покончено, но на ее место пришла новая группировка, известная как Skull Cross. Теперь в Metro City снова царит беззаконие! Мэр Mike Haggar и герой по имени Guy поклялись положить конец серии преступлений. К ним присоединились Lucia, старинная подруга Cody, и Dean, у которого свои счеты с бандитами. Вместе они сокрушат Skull Cross! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

RO.name: Final Fight 3™
RO.description: The Mad Gear gang has been defeated, but a new group known as Skull Cross has risen from the ashes, sparking a fresh crime wave in Metro City. Mayor Mike Haggar and Guy prepare to take them on with Cody's old friend, Lucia. Joining them is Dean, a mystery man with a grudge. Together they vow to bring Skull Cross down! This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Final Fight 3™
PT.description: O Mad Gear Gang foi derrotado, mas um novo grupo conhecido como Skull Cross renasceu das cinzas e deu início a uma nova onda de crime em Metro City. O presidente da câmara Mike Haggar e Guy preparam-se para os enfrentar juntamente com Lucia, uma amiga de longa data de Cody, e com Dean, um homem misterioso e rancoroso. Juntos comprometem-se a eliminar o grupo Skull Cross! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

NZ.name: Final Fight 3™
NZ.description: The Mad Gear gang has been defeated, but a new group known as Skull Cross has risen from the ashes, sparking a fresh crime wave in Metro City. Mayor Mike Haggar and Guy prepare to take them on with Cody's old friend, Lucia. Joining them is Dean, a mystery man with a grudge. Together they vow to bring Skull Cross down! This is the US version of the game.

This is the US version of the game.

DE.name: Final Fight 3™
DE.description: Die Mad Gear Gang wurde zwar besiegt, aber eine neue Bande namens Skull Cross hat ihren Platz eingenommen und ruft eine erneute Welle des Verbrechens in Metro City hervor. Bürgermeister Mike Haggar und Guy bereiten sich darauf vor, den Schurken gemeinsam mit Codys alter Freundin Lucia entgegenzutreten. Mit dabei ist außerdem der rätselhafte Dean, der auf Skull Cross nicht gut zu sprechen ist. Zusammen geloben sie, der Bande das Handwerk zu legen. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

ES.name: Final Fight 3™
ES.description: La banda Mad Gear ha sido derrotada, pero de sus cenizas ha surgido una nueva organización conocida como Skull Cross que ha desatado una nueva oleada criminal en Metro City. El alcalde, Mike Haggar, y Guy se disponen a enfrentarse a esta nueva amenaza con la ayuda de Lucía, una vieja amiga de Cody. A ellos se une Dean, un tipo misterioso con cuentas que saldar. Todos juntos se conjuran para acabar con los Skull Cross. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.
